f <- f[(grep("\\srender:", f)+1L):(grep("README.qmd", f)-1L)]
f <- gsub("^.+\\s(.+)\\.qmd$", "\\1", f)
for(i in f){
  cat("* [", i, "](", i, ".html)\n", sep = "")
}
